summary: So what this mod does is Boost your fps. Simple as that.
descriptionHtml:
These are just my ini Files, but they will boost performance! Im running these ini Files on my 2007 Pc (Trying to get it running on 30 fps) and i uploadet my ini files, because when I was looking around at the Internet, I found more of these Kinds of Mods, and all of them didn't really get me more fps. So these ini files are more or less the Result of about 10-15 forums. So yeah! Enjoy!

 To get even more performance use HialgoBoost: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15123/? I hope these ini Files will help you!
Installation: 
[list=1]
[*]Go to Documents
[*]Go to My Games
[*]Click on Skyrim
[*]Just replace the Files in the Rar with the Files in the Skyrim folder
[*]Don't Forget to make a Copy of your ini Files!!!
[/list]
Sorry for my bad english, im from Germany.
This mod isn't created for those people who have a Med to High End Pc and play on the highest setting and just want thair game to be more stable and shit. This mod was created for people who have a bad Pc, but still want to play this game!
author: Zockerkind1
